title: Have you ever been shot?
body:
It can be with anything ranging from BB pellet to a regular bullet, if no tell us about someone you know of getting shot.

-I have been shot by long ranged bird shot with a shotgun that has high spread... can't remember the choke
-I have been shot with a blow dart gun... don't ask how, but people are idiots.
-I have been shot only once with a paint ball gun and I have only played 5 times.
-I have been shot by heavy air soft guns... those are fun, only if you are wearing heavy clothes that is lol...

What about you GD?
